attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This infection is ripping through the heart of England!
It is a complete joke; the government gives you gambling then sets up extra health centres to deal with the addicts of gambling! 
And they say it’s all to regenerate the area, where as what will happen is the disadvantaged people will get hooked and the local community will be thrown into disrepair.
I bet our dear old Tony would not like to have a SUPER casino on his doorstep!! 
And to top it all off the culture minister has said it will regenerate Manchester, the one person who should realise that gambling is anti culture.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
